events.message: I have just been involved in a car collision on the highway and need to file a claim for the damages sustained.
The claim has been categorised under auto accident based on the details provided about the vehicle collision incident.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the assessment and further process the car accident claim.
Your claim for the vehicle accident has been officially acknowledged by our insurance department.
Please provide the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any medical bills related to the collision for our investigation.
All requested documents including the accident report and images of the car damage have been submitted for review.
Our claims team has begun the investigation to determine the cause of the accident and verify the submitted evidence.
The investigation has concluded, confirming that the collision occurred due to an unexpected vehicle malfunction.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the damage assessment and repair cost estimates.
We have received the customerâ€™s feedback regarding the proposed settlement, requesting clarification on the payout calculation.
After review and customer agreement, the claim for the auto accident has been officially approved.
The payment for the approved claim has been processed and issued to cover the vehicle repairs.
The claim case has been successfully closed following payment issuance and confirmation of satisfactory repairs.
All files and documentation related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
